hackWRF 0.4.7
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

add_FIT()

Function to add %FIT to stats

comparison()

Filter table A to perform a fair comparison with table B

displace()

Displace a vector

evaluation()

Model statistical evaluation

extract_max()

Creata a NetCDF file with the surface maximum

extract_max_8h()

Creata a NetCDF file with the surface maximum of O3

extract_mean()

Creata a NetCDF file with the surface mean

extract_regime()

Creata a NetCDF file with the ratio of FORM/(NO2 + O3)

extract_serie()

Extract time series of wrf file list of lat/lon

first()

Get the first element of a vector of data.frame

format_stats()

Function to format stat files

get_distances()

Get the distance in kilometers between two points.

last()

Get the last element of a vector of data.frame

latlon()

Get latitude and longitude.

legend_range()

Get the distance in kilometers between two points.

merge_emission()

Function to merge two different emissions

meta()

Read and write metadata on a NetCDF file

longitude() latitude()

PLot latitude and longitude

plot_raster()

Plot raster object

points_color()

Plot points with color

project_emission()

project emissions using growth factors.

raster_to_ncdf()

Convert a raster or brick to a array for WRF-Chem

read.stat()

Function to read stats and evaluation

SelectByInvertedDate()

Utility function to make it easier to remove select periods from a data frame

stats()

Calculate evaluation statistics from 2 vectors

summarizer()

make a summary using row.names

summary_emission()

Summary the emission from a emission file from WRF-Chem model

summary_emission_24h()

Summary the emission from two emission files (00Z and 12z) from WRF-Chem model

value2color()

Get color values from a vector inside a regular interval

write.stat()

Functions to write stats and evaluation

ccbind() crbind()

Combine R Objects by Columns or Rows
